Ultimo drops to his side and rolls his one knee leaking oil.  He rols across the ground avoiding the energy blasts.  Coming back onto one knee he aims.  "Auto"

"Online"

He pulled the trigger half way a red dot landing on Hellpeons stomach.  Another half pull and 25 shots rang out flying towards the red dot.
